citation: Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Road Vehicle Standards) Act 2020 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Road Vehicle Standards) Act 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Road Vehicle Standards) Act 2020 fix 1 July 2021 as the day on which that Act commences.

21 June 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 June 2021

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
